title: Barry Sheerman – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Barry Sheerman, the Labour MP for Huddersfield, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
A Party so lacking in talent or leadership they would haul back Johnson to captain their ship of shame.
